## ICredentialWallet.findByQuery() method

Find credential using iden3 query language

**Signature:**

```typescript
findByQuery(query: ProofQuery): Promise<W3CCredential[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  query | [ProofQuery](./js-sdk.proofquery.md) | protocol query to find credential |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[W3CCredential](./js-sdk.w3ccredential.md)\[\]&gt;

`Promise<W3CCredential[]>`
